unauthenticated.noAccount: If you do not have a GC Forms account,
unauthenticated.title: Sign in to access responses

card.noResponsesToDownload: There are no responses available to download.

notifications.trySelectingLessFilesHeader: Only {{max}} responses can be downloaded at a time.
notifications.trySelectingLessFiles: You have {{max}} responses selected. Uncheck at least 1 response before downloading.
notifications.atLeastOneFileHeader: At least one file must be selected to download.
notifications.atLeastOneFile: Try selecting at least one file to download.
notifications.errorDownloadingFiles: Try again in a few minutes. If the problem persists contact support.

notifications.maxEntriesTitle: Only {{max}} responses can be reported at a time.
notifications.maxEntriesDescription: Enter these form entries before entering more.

confirmReceiptDialog.title: Confirm receipt of responses
confirmReceiptDialog.findCode: Find the confirmation code on the bottom of the downloaded form response. It looks like: c0c42c90-b816-49da-a69a-80bfd8ba15db.
confirmReceiptDialog.copyCode: Copy and paste up to {{max}} confirmation codes, one per line.
confirmReceiptDialog.responsesAvailableFor: After you confirm receipt, responses will be available for 7 days then automatically removed from our database.

reportProblemsDialog.title: Report a problem with responses
reportProblemsDialog.findForm: Find the form number in the form list for any responses that will not download or open. They look like, 31-12-XCRV.
reportProblemsDialog.enterFormNumbers: Enter up-to {{max}} form numbers, one per line.
reportProblemsDialog.problemReported: After you report the problem, we will contact you to help resolve the problem.

notifications.entriesLengthConfirmHeader: At least one response must be specified
notifications.entriesLengthConfirmDescription: Enter the confirmation codes for responses that you've received.
notifications.entriesLengthReportHeader: At least one form must be specified
notifications.entriesLengthReportDescription: Enter the form numbers for responses that have a problem.
notifications.clientEntryHeader: An error occurred with one of the entries
notifications.clientEntryDescription: Please double check the entries are entered correct and try again.
notifications.unknownErrorDescription: Try again in a few minutes or contact
